name: Incline Landmine Press (Simulated with Dumbbell)
cues: Kneel on the floor, holding a dumbbell in one hand at shoulder height
Press the dumbbell upward and slightly forward at a 45Â° angle
Keep your core engaged and torso stable throughout the movement
Avoid shrugging your shoulder as you press
Control both the press and the return to the starting position
Keep your elbow tracking under your wrist
Start with a light weight to master the movement
Focus on a smooth, controlled press
Keep your glutes and abs tight for stability
variations: Perform standing or seated for different core demands
Use a landmine attachment if available
Alternate arms or perform both arms simultaneously
